value:
$WmMPID_パリス,ch04_45_Paris_M_Normal,Face|The road to strength... For you,
I guess, that means seeking stronger
Heroes, doesn't it?$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMPID_ザカリア影,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|Everything is proceeding as planned.$k$p$WmMPID_ザカリア影,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|Yes. Already a majority of the great
houses have sided with us.$k$pEveryone is willing to do their part if
it means removing Princess Veronica
from power.$k$pIf you, as imperial marquess, have
the force of the vassal houses in
such regions behind you...$k$p$WmMPID_ザカリア影,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|Then the empire will follow the
direction of my choosing.$k$pYes. And so, consider your
request granted.$k$p$WmMPID_ザカリア影,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|I am honored. Now, there is one
matter left to discuss. The emperor...$k$p$WmMPID_ザカリア影,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|Put your mind at ease. The emperor
is no friend to Veronica. After all, the
two share no blood between them.$k$pWhen Veronica faces accusation,
she will become a political liability
and a threat the emperor's control...$k$pWith Veronica more popular with the
people, the emperor will likely not
shy away from removing that threat.$k$pWe can use the opportunity to have
Veronica put into exile... Perhaps
even execution will be an option.$k$p$WmMPID_ザカリア影,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|Excellent. Then...allow me to propose
a toast then. To our success!$k$p...And Veronica's demise.$k$p$Sbs150|
